content: Try to get into the White House without an ID and see how far you get. What’s the difference? Why wouldn’t Obama allow citizens of this nation into the White House? I tried on several occasions through my Senator to get tickets and was always refused. I am a legal US citizen with no criminal record, I have a US Passport along with other forms of ID. I guess that i wasn’t black enough like all of those that gained entry! Now there’s a racist president with a glaring double standard!
